source.face8f5a:
import json
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd
import pandas_datareader as web
import datetime as dt
from fbprophet.plot import plot
from fbprophet import Prophet

# get data from yahoo for the cryptos
# init dataload
ada = "ADA"
btc = "BTC"
shib = "SHIB"
eth = "ETH"
grt = "GRT2"
dot = "DOT1"
aapl = "AAPL"
doge = "DOGE"

# stocks
pltr = "PLTR"

# default ccy
against_ccy = "USD"

ada_start = dt.datetime(2017,11,1)
btc_start = dt.datetime(2015,1,1)
shib_start = dt.datetime(2020,8,1)
eth_start = dt.datetime(2016,1,1)
grt_start = dt.datetime(2021,4,2)
pltr_start = dt.datetime(2020,9,30)
dot_start = dt.datetime(2020,9,22)
aapl_start = dt.datetime(2004,3,1)
doge_start = dt.datetime(2014,10,14)
end = dt.datetime.now()

# access crypto data from yahoo
df_ada_yahoo = web.DataReader(f'{ada}-{against_ccy}','yahoo',ada_start,end)
df_btc_yahoo = web.DataReader(f'{btc}-{against_ccy}','yahoo',btc_start,end)  
df_shib_yahoo = web.DataReader(f'{shib}-{against_ccy}','yahoo',shib_start,end)  
df_eth_yahoo = web.DataReader(f'{eth}-{against_ccy}','yahoo',eth_start,end) 
df_grt_yahoo = web.DataReader(f'{grt}-{against_ccy}','yahoo',grt_start,end) 
df_dot_yahoo = web.DataReader(f'{dot}-{against_ccy}','yahoo',dot_start,end) 
df_doge_yahoo = web.DataReader(f'{doge}-{against_ccy}','yahoo',doge_start,end)

# access stock data from yahoo
df_pltr_yahoo = web.DataReader(f'{pltr}','yahoo',pltr_start,end)
df_aapl_yahoo = web.DataReader(f'{aapl}','yahoo',aapl_start,end)

df_ada_yahoo.reset_index(inplace=True,drop=False)
df_ada_yahoo = df_ada_yahoo[["Date","Close"]]
df_ada_yahoo.columns = ["ds","y"]
# df_ada_yahoo.head()


df_btc_yahoo.reset_index(inplace=True,drop=False)
df_btc_yahoo = df_btc_yahoo[["Date","Close"]]
df_btc_yahoo.columns = ["ds","y"]
# df_btc_yahoo.head()

df_shib_yahoo.reset_index(inplace=True,drop=False)
df_shib_yahoo = df_shib_yahoo[["Date","Close"]]
df_shib_yahoo.columns = ["ds","y"]
#df_shib_yahoo.head()

df_eth_yahoo.reset_index(inplace=True,drop=False)
df_eth_yahoo = df_eth_yahoo[["Date","Close"]]
df_eth_yahoo.columns = ["ds","y"]
df_eth_yahoo.head()

df_grt_yahoo.reset_index(inplace=True,drop=False)
df_grt_yahoo = df_grt_yahoo[["Date","Close"]]
df_grt_yahoo.columns = ["ds","y"]
# df_grt_yahoo.head()

df_pltr_yahoo.reset_index(inplace=True,drop=False)
df_pltr_yahoo = df_pltr_yahoo[["Date","Close"]]
df_pltr_yahoo.columns = ["ds","y"]
# df_pltr_yahoo.head()

df_dot_yahoo.reset_index(inplace=True,drop=False)
df_dot_yahoo = df_dot_yahoo[["Date","Close"]]
df_dot_yahoo.columns = ["ds","y"]
# df_dot_yahoo.tail()

df_aapl_yahoo.reset_index(inplace=True,drop=False)
df_aapl_yahoo = df_aapl_yahoo[["Date","Close"]]
df_aapl_yahoo.columns = ["ds","y"]
# df_aapl_yahoo.tail()

df_doge_yahoo.reset_index(inplace=True,drop=False)
df_doge_yahoo = df_doge_yahoo[["Date","Close"]]
df_doge_yahoo.columns = ["ds","y"]
#df_shib_yahoo.head()
source.e9551557:
# data into the model 
prophet_ada = Prophet()
prophet_ada.fit(df_ada_yahoo)

# first prediction for ADA
future_ada = prophet_ada.make_future_dataframe(periods=365)
print(future_ada)

forecast_ada = prophet_ada.predict(future_ada)
#forecast_ada[["ds", "yhat", "yhat_lower", "yhat_upper"]].tail(20)
prophet_ada.plot(forecast_ada, figsize=(20, 10))
source.d1b1515d:
# data into the model 
prophet_btc = Prophet()
prophet_btc.fit(df_btc_yahoo)

# first prediction for BTC
future_btc = prophet_btc.make_future_dataframe(periods=365)
#print(future_btc)

forecast_btc = prophet_btc.predict(future_btc)
forecast_btc[["ds", "yhat", "yhat_lower", "yhat_upper"]].tail(20)
prophet_btc.plot(forecast_btc, figsize=(20, 10))

source.1d680cd7:
A starter on how to predict the development of prices in the cryptocurrency domain, using numpy, pandas, Facebook Prophet, and data from Yahoo.
The following Crypotcurrencies are part of this analysis: ADA, BTC, SHIB, ETH, GRT, DOT
The following Stock is part of this analysis: PLTR
The information in this notebook is a PoC and not to be used as financial advice.
